description: Leading AI and engineering initiatives to build scalable automations and Voice AI agents across sales, onboarding, CRM, and operations. Own end-to-end architecture and integrations with strong reliability and compliance guardrails.

Built and optimized cloud AI pipelines across AWS and Azure, including CI/CD migration and multi-cloud storage support. Improved pipeline flexibility and reduced operating costs through performance and infrastructure optimization.

Managed large-scale data workflows by organizing millions of images on AWS S3 and automating extraction of 15M+ MongoDB records for analytics. Supported computer vision model quality through annotation dataset creation and review.

Contributed to research-oriented ML development for text and tabular data using scikit-learn and PyTorch. Implemented feature pipelines, evaluation metrics, and custom training loops with early stopping and LR scheduling.
